Hello, this a Summary of the NZ LTPP programmes data!

It is a beta site hosted on Github and written with R and R Studio.  Update.


After "Build" website in RStudio use Git CMD (Deprecated) to cd to right directory in 

git add -A
git commit -m "new website"
git push

And remember need redirect index.html in github repo if making new site
and at .nojekyll file made (with nothing actually in it)
